data.meanings: fire, flame, heat, war, light, shine, sparkle, irritate, vex or provoke war.
data.sentence: The word النَّارِ comes from the root ن و ر and is associated with the meanings: fire, flame, heat, war, light, shine, sparkle, irritate, vex or provoke war.

data.meanings: to become fat/bulky/corpulent/large. naqatun fai'jun - a fat and bulky she camel. faujun - collection of persons, party/troop/company/group/crowd/band/army, people to who fallow a leader, host.
data.sentence: The word فَوْجٌ comes from the root ف و ج and is associated with the meanings: to become fat/bulky/corpulent/large. naqatun fai'jun - a fat and bulky she camel. faujun - collection of persons, party/troop/company/group/crowd/band/army, people to who fallow a leader, host.

data.meanings: to rush, enter, undertake, attempt (the uphill path), make haste, try, plunge, invade, jump, impel, embark boldly.
data.sentence: The word مُقْتَحِمٌ comes from the root ق ح م and is associated with the meanings: to rush, enter, undertake, attempt (the uphill path), make haste, try, plunge, invade, jump, impel, embark boldly.

data.meanings: to welcome, be ample, be spacious, be wide, be great. marhaban - a form of salutation equivalent to welcome.
data.sentence: The word مَرْحَبًا comes from the root ر ح ب and is associated with the meanings: to welcome, be ample, be spacious, be wide, be great. marhaban - a form of salutation equivalent to welcome.

data.meanings: to warm at the fire, endure heat, to roast/fry/broil/burn.
data.sentence: The word صَالُوا comes from the root ص ل ي and is associated with the meanings: to warm at the fire, endure heat, to roast/fry/broil/burn.
